StonyCreekMetropark.error: Failed to fetch conditions: connect ETIMEDOUT 69.167.186.18:443

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Sat 1:30-2:30 4° to 6° Full Cedar Trace and Coyote loops skating. Cedar Trace (contractors) was good and fast enough, Coyote west side plenty of snow east side sketchy but doable. Coyote loop behind Bucks had the best fast snow. 1 lap on Bucks and it was squeaky slow, classic looked fast. Fresh Toko Performance Blue ironed in and scraped and brushed well really helped.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Plenty of snow in woods and on golf course, woods was nicer, less wind. Trail was soft, easy climbing but not much speed on downhills. Only classic tracks were skier produced; it would be nice if the foot traffic would stop walking in the ski tracks.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 chairlifts, rope tow and the conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are groomed and in excellent condition. There is a youth XC race on the lower trails this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It's cold and still winter morning at Nub's Nob. The temperature should climb rapidly as the sun comes up with a predicted high of 12 degrees with virtually no wind. The slopes are machined groomed with beautiful corduroy. NASTAR racing from 12:30 to 2:30 p.m. on Birch Run. USSS racing on Scarface today. The Beech Nuts Jr. XC race is on the lower trails until 11:00 a.m. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. The soup of the day is sausage and potato. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
